citances.sentence: On 7 July 2009 I delivered my principal reasons for decision in this proceeding ( Diakyne Pty Limited v Ralph [2009] FCA 721). I ordered the parties to file draft orders reflecting the reasons for judgment for the applicant (including with respect to interest and costs). The parties agreed to the orders save as to costs.
